foreignData.name: Hexenmaschine
foreignData.text:
Sumpftarnung
{T}: Erhöhe Deinen Manavorrat um BBBB. Ein Gegner Deiner Wahl übernimmt die Kontrolle über die Hexenmaschine. Spiele diese Fähigkeit wie einen Spontanzauber.

name: Witch Engine
originalText:
Swampwalk (If defending player controls a swamp, this creature is unblockable.)
oc
T: Add o
Bo
Bo
Bo
B to your mana pool. Target opponent gains control of Witch Engine. (Play this ability as an instant.)

rulings.text: Because the ability is targeted, it is not a mana ability. It can only be activated when you have priority, and goes on the stack like other non-mana abilities.

text:
Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)
{T}: Add {B}{B}{B}{B}. Target opponent gains control of Witch Engine. (Activate only as an instant.)
